products.title: Azurite Chenille Teal Blue Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Azurite chenille teal blue roman blind in blue/green. Made to measure from 20.63 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. This soft green/blue oman blind fuses a plush, luxuy feel in a contemporary ocean blue tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. 
 
At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this roman comes with their free five year guarantee and customer-first service. Available as a matching curtain!
 
 Product id: db-rom1141 fabric colour: teal blue material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.   Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes
